paper_abstract: An orbit following guiding center Monte Carlo calculation is presented which employs a general flux coordinate system in an axisymmetric plasma equilibrium The calculation incorporates collision effects Furthermore a perturbation expansion is applied for the guiding center calculations in the presence of a frictional source (C) 2010 Elsevier BV All rights reserved
paper_title: A perturbation method for guiding center orbit following calculations in the presence of Coulomb collisions
